decision_conditions: The materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development/extension hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building and shall thereafter be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved pl<span style="font-size: 14px;">ans and thereafter maintained as such for the lifetime of the development: - drawing numbers&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/106 Rev A dated 27.07.2022, and&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/101 Rev B,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/102 Rev B,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/103 Rev B,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/104 Rev B,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/105 Rev B,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;">N.A/19SR/107 Rev B dated 17.01.2023.</span>
The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey rear wraparound extension at ground floor level.
